Brightwheel is the only app that integrates everything you need: sign in/out, messaging, learning assessments, daily sheet reports, photos, videos, calendars, online bill pay for parents, and much more.  2. –ß–∞—Å—Ç–Ω–∞—è —à–∫–æ–ª–∞ - Parent plus   ParentPlus Portal mobile app, which gives parents mobile access to their students' grades, attendance, schedules, assignments, and more.  You can also access your students‚Äô portals; view school announcements, alerts, mobile notifications, and calendar events; and communicate with administrators and teachers using email or messages.
